name: Synth Racer
description:
Was listening to some Synthwave on YouTube.

Saw the cover art.

Yes.

Fly a ship through a series of gates, while avoiding obstacles and remaining on the track. You win once you fly through the final gate

I've only exported this for Windows as it's a beginner's practice project essentially

Crediting others:

Music by Dieswyx https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/964876

SFX by zgump  https://freesound.org/people/zgump/sounds/86330/

SFX by V-ktor https://freesound.org/people/V-ktor/sounds/435413/
